Title: Your codebase, your rules: Customizing Copilot with context engineering
Description:
Join us to unlock the full potential of GitHub Copilot in VS Code into a deeply context-aware AI pair programmer that understands not just your specific codebase, but also your team's workflows. Learn how to combine custom instructions, prompt engineering, MCPs, and context engineering principles to give Copilot insight into your project structure, architectural decisions, and coding patterns. Walk away with a practical framework for scaling context-aware workflows across enterprise codebases with GitHub Copilot Enterprise, along with ready-to-use templates for project-wide context and plan-specific instructions.

Speaker: Harald Kirschner, Principal Product Manager, Microsoft (Speaker)
